//Firebase Database field users user_account_setting username name infs3634-flagmaster-app-default-rtdb.asia-southeast1.firebasedatabase.app/ FlagMaster aims to provide users with a clear and accessible learning platform to learn about different flags and have a diverse understanding of countriesâ€™ geography. The application focuses on bringing an interactive, engaging, and personalized way for users to learn flags in the form of gamification, rather than the traditional flag dictionary showing just the listed content. Important: You need an internet connection to use FlagMaster.
Click the Quiz button in the navigation bar 
 --> Choose a continent you wish to be quizzed 
 --> Choose the type of quiz you wish to complete.
Click the Learn button in the navigation bar 
 --> Click the icon on the top right corner of the screen to sort countries by name or region 
 --> Choose a country you want to get more information.
Click the Profile button in the navigation bar 
 --> Click the Settings button on the top right corner 
 --> Edit your details 
 --> Save changes.
